main event: A boy sighted a UFO in Vernon, Texas on 27 February 1961 and reported it to Altus AFB.
interesting points: The UFO was visually observed for 8 minutes,The report was submitted to the Air Force but no record of it was found,The case was classified as having insufficient data for evaluation, The conclusions suggest it was not a balloon but probably an aircraft or possibly astronomical, The sighting prompted communication with the Air Force regarding UFO reporting policies.
